name: Island Xtreme Stunts
summary: Island Xtreme Stunts is a mixture of different genres in a single game. The player goes through a level-select on the overworld to choose each mission. You ride a skateboard, drive, fly and more, while sometimes taking on the evil Brickster. The player is cast as Pepper Roni, a lead stuntman in a big movie production set on LEGO Island.
